featured.text: It is refined to remove its impurities and blended to improve flavor, and is recommended for all-purpose cooking.
The recent cooking oil scandals have led to calls for tougher ______ of sales of food products.

definition.zh_def: 烹飪，指準備和烹調食物的過程。
definition.en_def: The act of preparing and preparing food.
definition.example: She enjoys cooking new recipes on the weekends.
